class.name: GSAIPath
class.brief_description: Represents a path made up of Vector3 waypoints, split into segments path follow behaviors can use.
class.description: Represents a path made up of Vector3 waypoints, split into segments path follow behaviors can use.

method.name: calculate_target_position
method.description: Calculates a target position from the path's starting point based on the target_distance.

method.name: create_path
method.description: Creates a path from a list of waypoints.

method.name: get_end_point
method.description: Returns the position of the last point on the path.

method.name: get_start_point
method.description: Returns the position of the first point on the path.
